name: Uprising 2: Lead and Destroy
description: After a century of bloody galactic battle, a horde of intelligent bloodthirsty aliens, known as the Kriâ€™iSara, threaten to exterminate all human life. New Alliance Command is counting on you to destroy the alien menace.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows : Vista / 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: 1.8 GHz Processor Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 3D graphics card compatible with DirectX 7 Storage: 500 MB available space Sound Card: 100% DirectX compatible card or onboard sound

reviews.review_text: Had to buy instantly. No crashes and you can force AA from the desktop. It's good to be back.
